LCD.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: the part of a watch, calculator, or small computer where numbers or letters are shown by means of an electric current that is passed through a special liquid
LCD.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: liquid crystal display; a type of screen where an electric current is passed through a liquid chemical in order to show numbers, letters etc. LCDs are used especially on small computers, scientific instruments, and watches
